voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.sonix.recorder/AudioSession

AudioSession

class AudioSession(config: AudioConfig, recorder: AudioRecorder, enableEncoding: Boolean = false, encoderBitRate: Int = 128000)

Audio recording session with optional encoding support.

This class manages audio recording and provides a stream of raw audio frames. Feature extraction (pitch detection, VAD, etc.) should be done by the consuming application using Calibra library.

Usage (basic recording):

val session = AudioSession(config, recorder)
session.start()

// Subscribe to audio frames for external processing (e.g., with Calibra)
session.audioFlow.collect { frame ->
    val features = calibraFeatureExtractor.extract(frame)
}

session.stop()
Content copied to clipboard

Usage (with encoding):

val session = AudioSession(config, recorder, enableEncoding = true)
session.start()

// Record for some time...

// Stop and save to file
val outputPath = session.stopAndSave("/path/to/recording.m4a")
Content copied to clipboard

Properties

audioFlow
Link copied to clipboard
val audioFlow: SharedFlow<AudioBuffer>

Raw audio frames - subscribe to process with Calibra or other DSP library. Each AudioBuffer contains PCM bytes with timestamp.

Link copied to clipboard
val isRecording: Boolean

Check if currently recording.

Get duration of current recording in milliseconds.

synchronizedTimeMs
Link copied to clipboard
val synchronizedTimeMs: Long

Get the playback-synchronized current time. If a PlaybackInfoProvider is set, returns the playback time. Otherwise, returns the recording duration.

release
Link copied to clipboard
fun release()

Release all resources. After calling this, the session cannot be reused.

setPlaybackInfoProvider
Link copied to clipboard
fun setPlaybackInfoProvider(provider: PlaybackInfoProvider?)

Set playback info provider for synchronization. Use this to align recording timestamps with backing track.

start
Link copied to clipboard
suspend fun start()

Start recording. If encoding is enabled, audio data will be buffered for later encoding.

startRecordingSegment
Link copied to clipboard
fun startRecordingSegment(segmentIndex: Int)

Start recording a segment within the current session. Call this when the user begins a practice attempt.

stop
Link copied to clipboard
fun stop(): Long

Stop recording without saving. Use this when you don't need to save the recording to a file.

stopAndSave
Link copied to clipboard
suspend fun stopAndSave(outputPath: String): String?

Stop recording and save to file. Only works if enableEncoding was set to true.

Link copied to clipboard
suspend fun stopRecordingSegmentAndSaveAudio(segmentIndex: Int, outputDir: String): String?

Stop recording the current segment and save to file.

fun syncWithPlaybackTime(playbackTimeMs: Long)

Sync recorder timeline with playback position. Call this when seeking in backing track.
